data.eml:eml: Melambyrsus hoplita Breddin rediscovered (Hemiptera: Pentatomidae: Discocephalinae): redescription of genus and species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Campos, Luiz Alexandre, Roell, Talita (2017): Melambyrsus hoplita Breddin rediscovered (Hemiptera: Pentatomidae: Discocephalinae): redescription of genus and species. Zootaxa 4286 (1): 134-138, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4286.1.11
